verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Depart, <S%H1980><s%> and go up <S%H5927><s%> hence, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast brought up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Unto thy seed <S%H2233><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> it:

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee; and I will drive out <S%H1644><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite: <S%H2983><s%>

Unto <S%H413><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey: <S%H1706><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee; for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art a stiffnecked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> I consume <S%H3615><s%> thee in the way. <S%H1870><s%>

And when the people <S%H5971><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> tidings, <S%H1697><s%> they mourned: <S%H56><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> did put <S%H7896><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> him his ornaments. <S%H5716><s%>

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Ye <S%H859><s%> are a stiffnecked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> I will come up <S%H5927><s%> into the midst <S%H7130><s%> of thee in a <S%H259><s%> moment, <S%H7281><s%> and consume <S%H3615><s%> thee: therefore now <S%H6258><s%> put off <S%H3381><s%> thy ornaments <S%H5716><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee, that I may know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> unto thee.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stripped themselves <S%H5337><s%> of <S%H853><s%> their ornaments <S%H5716><s%> by the mount <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2022><s%> Horeb. <S%H2722><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> and pitched <S%H5186><s%> it without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> afar off <S%H7368><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> it the Tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%> And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that every one <S%H3605><s%> which sought <S%H1245><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when Moses <S%H4872><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> rose up, <S%H6965><s%> and stood <S%H5324><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> at his tent <S%H168><s%> door, <S%H6607><s%> and looked <S%H5027><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he was gone <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle. <S%H168><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> entered into <S%H935><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> pillar <S%H5982><s%> descended, <S%H3381><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> and the LORD talked <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> pillar <S%H5982><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> at the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> door: <S%H6607><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> and worshiped, <S%H7812><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> in his tent <S%H168><s%> door. <S%H6607><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to <S%H413><s%> face, <S%H6440><s%> as <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> speaketh <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his friend. <S%H7453><s%> And he turned again <S%H7725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the camp: <S%H4264><s%> but his servant <S%H8334><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> a young man, <S%H5288><s%> departed <S%H4185><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H168><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> sayest <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Bring up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> and thou <S%H859><s%> hast not <S%H3808><s%> let me know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H853><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou wilt send <S%H7971><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> me. Yet thou <S%H859><s%> hast said, <S%H559><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> thee by name, <S%H8034><s%> and thou hast also <S%H1571><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in my sight. <S%H5869><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> if <S%H518><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight, <S%H5869><s%> show <S%H3045><s%> me now <S%H4994><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy way, <S%H1870><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> I may know <S%H3045><s%> thee, that I may find <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight: <S%H5869><s%> and consider <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> is thy people. <S%H5971><s%>
And he said, <S%H559><s%> My presence <S%H6440><s%> shall go <S%H1980><s%> with thee, and I will give thee rest. <S%H5117><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, If <S%H518><s%> thy presence <S%H6440><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> not <S%H369><s%> with me, carry us not up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H408><s%> hence. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%>

For wherein <S%H4100><s%> shall it be known <S%H3045><s%> here <S%H645><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> and thy people <S%H5971><s%> have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight? <S%H5869><s%> is it not <S%H3808><s%> in that thou goest <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> us? so shall we be separated, <S%H6395><s%> I <S%H589><s%> and thy people, <S%H5971><s%> from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou hast spoken: <S%H1696><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou hast found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in my sight, <S%H5869><s%> and I know <S%H3045><s%> thee by name. <S%H8034><s%>
And he said, <S%H559><s%> I beseech thee, <S%H4994><s%> show <S%H7200><s%> me <S%H853><s%> thy glory. <S%H3519><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H589><s%> will make all <S%H3605><s%> my goodness <S%H2898><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, and I will proclaim <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee; and will be gracious <S%H2603><s%> <S%H853><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> I will be gracious, <S%H2603><s%> and will show mercy <S%H7355><s%> <S%H853><s%> on whom <S%H834><s%> I will show mercy. <S%H7355><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Thou canst <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> my face: <S%H6440><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> there shall no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H120><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> me, and live. <S%H2425><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> there is a place <S%H4725><s%> by <S%H854><s%> me, and thou shalt stand <S%H5324><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> a rock: <S%H6697><s%>

And it shall come to pass, <S%H1961><s%> while my glory <S%H3519><s%> passeth by, <S%H5674><s%> that I will put <S%H7760><s%> thee in a cleft <S%H5366><s%> of the rock, <S%H6697><s%> and will cover <S%H5526><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee with my hand <S%H3709><s%> while <S%H5704><s%> I pass by: <S%H5674><s%>

And I will take away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine hand, <S%H3709><s%> and thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> my back parts: <S%H268><s%> but my face <S%H6440><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> be seen. <S%H7200><s%>
